nodes.documentation:
@notice Get if the evidence with content hash `evidenceHash` is already registered.
 @param evidenceHash Hash of the evidence content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash
nodes.name: getEvidenceExistence

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The evidence has been already registered"

arguments.value: The evidence has been already registered

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The evidence has been already registered"

nodes.name: addEvidence
